website_summaries.verdict: An adorable Child to Cherish piggy bank that is a well-made, adorable option capable of holding lots of coins. Ideal for young sports fans.
pros: Attractive, glazed ceramic piggy bank by a popular brand
Has sports graphics, including a baseball, basketball, football and soccer ball
Coins can be removed from belly stopper
cons: Rare reports of flaws in the paint have been noted

customer_reviews.title: Adorable Banks
customer_reviews.text: We loved these banks! Ordered 2 of the white with sports balls on for our 2 grandsons' birthdays and were very pleased with the size and appearance. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Leda Banic

customer_reviews.title: It's big enough to put plenty of money in
customer_reviews.text: Like it very much it's for my grandson and plenty of room to put money in
customer_reviews.author: Mike Gasper

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for 2-year old
customer_reviews.text: Great birthday gift. Obviously, not a toy to be played with, but a great 'heirloom' gift to be remembered in the years to come. I love it. Love the sports theme.
customer_reviews.author: William R. Clayton

customer_reviews.title: Super cute
customer_reviews.text: This arrived packed really carefully so that it would not be broken. Its a large piggy bank and the print on it was really nicely done and the colors were great. I bought this as a baby shower gift for a friends daughter who was having a baby boy. They loved it. I would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: C Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great quality piggy bank
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old is obsessed with balls and loves this piggy bank to put his coins in. He had a tiny bank that was full, so he was excited for how big this one is.
customer_reviews.author: Misty

customer_reviews.title: This was a birthday gift for our 6 year old ...
customer_reviews.text: This was a birthday gift for our 6 year old granddaughter. She loves owls so this ceramic bank was exactly what we were looking for. It is large and will hold lots of change---of course papa and nana put in some change to get her savings started.
customer_reviews.author: CT

customer_reviews.title: Best Piggy Bank on the Market
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for the perfect piggy bank that would last over the years for my now 3 year old grandson. This is by far the best one on the market. Super thrilled with it.
customer_reviews.author: Geri

customer_reviews.title: piggy bank
customer_reviews.text: I searched and searched for a large ceramic bank and found it here at Amazon. It is a perfect size. Was shipped carefully and got here in one piece so I was pleased. It is a really nice bank although I felt it was a little pricey..................
customer_reviews.author: quilter

customer_reviews.title: Customer  service is great thank you
customer_reviews.text: The first one was broken the the seller fixed that got a new one fast love it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon112368ha Customer

customer_reviews.title: Colorful
customer_reviews.text: What a cute bank! I got it for myself to put in the laundry room for all the loose change I seem to wash. It's well made and sturdy with skid proof tabs on each hoof. Bank was larger than I thought (which is good), colors are bright and happy.
customer_reviews.author: katz

customer_reviews.title: Sticky feet inside
customer_reviews.text: Size is large piggy bank. Design is exactly as pictured. Only problem is when change is put in, the pig's feet are sticky on the inside so change got stuck. This is from nonslip stickers and hole at bottom of each foot.
customer_reviews.author: Leigh

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: This piggy bank is very cute and perfect for the child that likes all sports!!

customer_reviews.title: Its important to teach kids to save
customer_reviews.text: This is what Grandparents are for. Lessons that kids don't want. But it is nostalgic and fun.
customer_reviews.author: Famousk1

customer_reviews.title: Baby gift
customer_reviews.text: This is so adorable!!! Very big and colorful. Great paint job on animals. Really a very good price!!
customer_reviews.author: Terri

customer_reviews.title: Fun for our kids
customer_reviews.text: Tried to find a piggy bank to start teaching our kids about saving, and that would last through the years... we have girls and I wanted to stay away from anything too specific. These were perfect although a bit larger than expected! The girls love them!
customer_reviews.author: JLV

customer_reviews.title: Beauitful Piggy Bank
customer_reviews.text: All of my kids have piggy banks and I was on the hunt for a cute piggy bank for my daughter and I found it. The ladybug and flower design is beautiful and the piggy bank is very large so you definitely get your money's worth. If you are looking for a unique, high quality piggy bank for your kid's room I recommend this!

customer_reviews.title: Looks just like the picture.

customer_reviews.title: Cute gift

customer_reviews.title: Terrific LARGE piggy bank!
customer_reviews.text: This piggy bank is GREAT! The plane decor on it is beautiful, the size is ideal, and furthermore, it came wrapped very securely. If anyone wants a substantial bank for a kids' room, this is it. I am very happy w/my purchase.

customer_reviews.title: Cute little piggy bank
customer_reviews.text: I'm expecting a new niece soon. Her parents decorated her room with a safari theme, so I wanted a piggy bank to represent that same theme as well. I came across this one on Amazon...I was expecting it to be bigger than the actual size, but for a new born I think this will do. The painted animals on there are adorable...I know Amazon doesn't show the side with the monkey, but that one is my favorite...too cute!!
customer_reviews.author: RLo

customer_reviews.title: teach them so save when they are little!
customer_reviews.text: I love it. My grandson will be so excited with all the sports stuff on it. I think it will encourage him to put his money there when he gets it instead of in his pockets! He loves to carry it --- he is only 3.

customer_reviews.title: Great product

customer_reviews.title: Big bank with great workmanship.

customer_reviews.title: Just What I Was Looking For

customer_reviews.title: Overall, this is a great product

The only drawback is that most of the design is on the side and back of the piggy bank- the face of the pig is completely without any color and just looks like a plain white piggy bank. I wish some of the design carried over into the front of the bank.

product_meta.title: Child to Cherish Ceramic Piggy Bank for Boys, Sports
product_meta.description: Color:Sports DesignOur ceramic piggy banks are a classic keepsake made to last. Each bank is commissioned from the highest quality ceramic known as dolomite ensuring increased durability. All of the banks are then glazed, hand painted, and fired to lock in the colors and attention to detail, making them truly one of a kind. The Child to Cherish brand features coin banks of all shapes and sizes, with many color options and themes to suit boys and girls rooms alike. Child to Cherish piggy banks are a great addition to any nursery decor or kids room that will last through the years and grow with the child as they learn to save their money. Find the perfect baby shower or christening gift that is sure to touch the hearts of any new or expecting parent. We hope the little ones will enjoy saving for many years to come.
feature_bullets: Beautifully glazed piggy bank features a hand painted design and measures at 8 x 7 inches
Made of high quality ceramic dolomite for a long lasting classic keepsake
Piggy bank is equipped with a 1.5 inch coin slot at the top and a removable rubber stopper to hold in the coins at the bottom.
Kids will love learning to save their money as they fill up this special piggy bank
Perfect for any baby's nursery or kids room, making this a great gift for baptisms, christenings, birthdays, and more.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars222 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
